label: clinical_signal_03_dx_pain_management_trial_017
content:
## 2024-06-24 Daily Operations Summary

### Enrollment
- Total Enrolled: 110
- Active: 101
- Screen Failures Cumulative: 47
- Withdrawals Cumulative: 9

### Enrollment By Treatment Arm
- Multimodal: 36
- Standard: 37
- Placebo: 37

### Efficacy By Arm
- Multimodal VAS Pain Score Mean: 5.2
- Multimodal VAS Pain Score SD: 1.9
- Multimodal Morphine Equivalents (mg) Mean: 30.0
- Multimodal Morphine Equivalents (mg) SD: 11.5
- Multimodal Six Minute Walk Test (meters) Mean: 343.0
- Multimodal Six Minute Walk Test (meters) SD: 34.0
- Multimodal Grip Strength (kg) Mean: 26.7
- Multimodal Grip Strength (kg) SD: 4.2
- Multimodal Sleep Quality Index Mean: 5.7
- Multimodal Sleep Quality Index SD: 0.9
- Multimodal Rescue Med Doses Per Week Mean: 2.9
- Multimodal Rescue Med Doses Per Week SD: 1.1

- Standard VAS Pain Score Mean: 6.0
- Standard VAS Pain Score SD: 1.1
- Standard Morphine Equivalents (mg) Mean: 44.6
- Standard Morphine Equivalents (mg) SD: 10.5
- Standard Six Minute Walk Test (meters) Mean: 298.0
- Standard Six Minute Walk Test (meters) SD: 55.0
- Standard Grip Strength (kg) Mean: 22.8
- Standard Grip Strength (kg) SD: 4.0
- Standard Sleep Quality Index Mean: 4.4
- Standard Sleep Quality Index SD: 1.5
- Standard Rescue Med Doses Per Week Mean: 4.6
- Standard Rescue Med Doses Per Week SD: 1.3

- Placebo VAS Pain Score Mean: 6.3
- Placebo VAS Pain Score SD: 1.8
- Placebo Morphine Equivalents (mg) Mean: 45.0
- Placebo Morphine Equivalents (mg) SD: 11.6
- Placebo Six Minute Walk Test (meters) Mean: 269.0
- Placebo Six Minute Walk Test (meters) SD: 33.0
- Placebo Grip Strength (kg) Mean: 19.7
- Placebo Grip Strength (kg) SD: 5.4
- Placebo Sleep Quality Index Mean: 4.1
- Placebo Sleep Quality Index SD: 1.4
- Placebo Rescue Med Doses Per Week Mean: 6.0
- Placebo Rescue Med Doses Per Week SD: 1.9

### Physical Therapy
- Sessions Scheduled: 224
- Sessions Attended: 194
- Attendance Rate (%): 88.5

### Safety Labs
- Hemoglobin (g/dL) Mean: 13.3
- Hemoglobin (g/dL) SD: 1.3
- WBC (k) Mean: 7.0
- WBC (k) SD: 1.2

- Platelets (k) SD: 41

- ESR (mm/hr) Mean: 12.0
- ESR (mm/hr) SD: 7.0

### Adverse Events
- AE ID: PM-AE-1702, Description: nausea, Grade: 1, Relatedness: unlikely related, Resolved: true, Treatment Arm: standard
- AE ID: PM-AE-1758, Description: diaphoresis, Grade: 1, Relatedness: possibly related, Resolved: false, Treatment Arm: standard
- AE ID: PM-AE-1749, Description: pruritus, Grade: 1, Relatedness: possibly related, Resolved: true, Treatment Arm: multimodal
- AE ID: PM-AE-1776, Description: diaphoresis, Grade: 1, Relatedness: possibly related, Resolved: true, Treatment Arm: standard

### Protocol Deviations
- PD ID: PM-PD-1745, Description: VAS assessment outside scheduled window, Severity: minor

### Events
- Site 01 monitoring visit completed, 1 findings
- Blinded interim efficacy data compiled for DSMB

### Notes
- Week 17: Pain management assessments on track. 110 subjects enrolled across treatment arms. Functional outcomes within expected ranges.
